text: La maison des bois (engl. The house in the woods) is a 1971 French mini- series, consisting of seven episodes. It was directed by Maurice Pialat and written by René Wheeler, starring Pierre Doris, Jacqueline Dufranne and Agathe Natanson. The mini-series takes place during World War I and tells about the daily life in a French village.http://www.bampfa.berkeley.edu/event/house- woods-0 Gaumont has released the mini-series on DVD in 2005.Frédéric Mercier: La Maison des Bois. DvdClassik, Nov 28, 2007. http://www.dvdclassik.com/test/dvd-la-maison-des-bois-gaumont-columbia- tristar-coffret-3dvd ==References== ==External links== * Category:Films directed by Maurice Pialat Category:1970s French television miniseries Category:World War I television drama series Category:1970s French television series Category:1971 French television series debuts Category:1971 French television series endings
title: La maison des bois
